entry.def: If you describe an action or idea as retrogressive, you disapprove of it because it returns to old ideas or beliefs and does not take advantage of recent progress.

example.ex: ...the retrogressive policies of the National parties.

auth_sentence.content: "Many see this as unjust and have begun to co-ordinate with each other and put pressure on retrogressive societies," she says.
